scripts.start:fake: concurrently "npm run server:fake" "npm run client" -n SERVER,CLIENT -c bgBlue,bgGreen,bgYellow
scripts.start:twitter: concurrently "npm run server:twitter" "npm run client" -n SERVER,CLIENT -c bgBlue,bgGreen,bgYellow
scripts.server:fake: cross-env APP_BACKEND=fake nodemon server.js --exec babel-node --presets env
scripts.server:twitter: cross-env APP_BACKEND=twitter nodemon server.js --exec babel-node --presets env
